Television in Montenegro was first introduced in 1956. This is a list of television channels that broadcast in Montenegro.

Contents

  • 1 National
    • 1.1 RTCG
    • 1.2 Private
  • 2 Local
  • 3 Defunct TV stations
  • 4 See also

National[edit]

RTCG[edit]

  • TVCG 1, since 1963
  • TVCG 2, since 1971
  • TVCG Sat – satellite

Private[edit]

  • Pink M, since 2002
  • Vijesti, since 2008
  • Prva, since 2011
  • A1 TV, since 2018

Local[edit]

  • RTV APR – From Rožaje, seen in Rožaje and Berane
  • RTV Nikšić – From Nikšić, seen in and around Nikšić
  • TV Budva – From Budva, seen in and around Budva
  • RTPV – From Pljevlja, seen in and around Pljevlja
  • TV Teuta – From Ulcinj, seen in Ulcinj, Bar, Podgorica
  • TV BOiN – From Tuzi, seen in Tuzi, Ulcinj, Podgorica
  • TV SUN – From Bijelo Polje, seen in and around Bijelo Polje
  • TV 777 - From Podgorica, seen in Podgorica and neighboring municipalities
  • TV Novi - From Herceg Novi, seen in Herceg Novi and neighboring municipalities

Defunct TV stations[edit]

  • Elmag RTV – From Podgorica
  • IN TV – From Podgorica
  • Atlas - From Podgorica
  • NTV Montena – From Podgorica
  • MBC - from Podgorica

See also[edit]

  • List of television stations in Serbia and Montenegro
